thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Julian V. Hills
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Julian V. Hills

author: Julian V. Hills
title: Julian V. Hills
text: It seems to me that Biblio gees out of its way to combine full-service, technologically up-to-date access to a massive inventory with the feel of a "collectors' guild." When, as often happens, the same book is listed on several sites, my first choice is always to buy through Biblio -- and not only because of my Bibliophiles membership!
